languages.text: "Эта... печать величия на твоем лице. Каждый раз ты будто видел{mf||а} людей — даже меня, — насквозь. Читал{mf||а} их мотивы. Совершал{mf||а} подвиги, побеждал{mf||а}. И все в твоих словах и поступках превозносило тебя над обычными людьми, будто пьедестал сам рос под твоими ногами. Если взглянуть на многих Вольных Торговцев, то станет видно, насколько выродилась их порода, но ты..."

"That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."
languages.original_text: "Эта... печать величия на твоем лице. Каждый раз ты будто видел{mf||а} людей — даже меня, — насквозь. Читал{mf||а} их мотивы. Совершал{mf||а} подвиги, побеждал{mf||а}. И все в твоих словах и поступках превозносило тебя над обычными людьми, будто пьедестал сам рос под твоими ногами. Если взглянуть на многих Вольных Торговцев, то станет видно, насколько выродилась их порода, но ты..."

traits.locale_text: "That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their thoughts and motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

"That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their thoughts and motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

languages.text: 「その…君の顔に刻まれた威厳の印。あなたは何度も、人々を、私のことさえも本質を見抜きました。彼らの動機を読み取り、驚くべき偉業を成し遂げ、次々と勝利を手にしました。あなたの言葉も行動もすべて、あなたを普通の人間より高みに押し上げました。まるで、あなたの足元から台座が自然にせり上がってきたかのように。多くのローグトレーダーたちを見れば、かつての面影が失われたことはすぐにわかる。けれど、あなたは…」
languages.original_text: "That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

traits.locale_text: 「その…君の顔に刻まれた威厳の印。あなたは何度も、人々を、私のことさえも本質を見抜きました。彼らの考えや動機を読み取り、驚くべき偉業を成し遂げ、次々と勝利を手にしました。あなたの言葉も行動もすべて、あなたを普通の人間より高みに押し上げました。まるで、あなたの足元から台座が自然にせり上がってきたかのように。多くのローグトレーダーたちを見れば、かつての面影が失われたことはすぐにわかる。けれど、あなたは…」

languages.text: "Dieser ... Hauch von wahrer Größe in Eurem Gesicht. Immer wieder habt Ihr Leute sofort durchschaut – sogar mich. Ihr habt ihre Motive gelesen. Ihr habt Unglaubliches geleistet, Sieg um Sieg errungen. Und alles in Euren Worten und Taten erhob Euch über gewöhnliche Menschen, als sei unter Euch spontan ein Podest erstanden. Wirft man einen Blick auf die Freihändler, muss man sagen, dass sie nicht mehr sind, was sie einst waren, aber Ihr ..."
languages.original_text: "That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser ... Hauch von wahrer Größe in Eurem Gesicht. Immer wieder habt Ihr Leute sofort durchschaut – sogar mich. Ihr habt ihre Motive gelesen. Ihr habt Unglaubliches geleistet, Sieg um Sieg errungen. Und alles in Euren Worten und Taten erhob Euch über gewöhnliche Menschen, als sei unter Euch spontan ein Podest erstanden. Wirft man einen Blick auf die Freihändler, muss man sagen, dass sie nicht mehr sind, was sie einst waren, aber Ihr ..."

languages.text: « Cette... aura de grandeur qui se dégage de vos traits. À chaque fois, vous avez su déceler la vraie nature des autres, moi compris. Vous avez discerné leurs motifs. Vous avez accompli l'impossible et remporté victoire après victoire. Et il n'est pas jusqu'à la moindre de vos paroles et jusqu'au moindre de vos actes qui ne vous ait {mf|élevé|élevée} au-dessus du commun des mortels, comme si un piédestal s'était spontanément matérialisé sous vos pieds. À regarder bon nombre de libres-marchands, on voit tout de suite que cette caste n'est plus ce qu'elle était, mais vous... »
languages.original_text: "That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

traits.locale_text: « Cette... aura de grandeur qui se dégage de vos traits. À chaque fois, vous avez su déceler la vraie nature des autres, moi compris. Vous avez discerné leurs motifs. Vous avez accompli l'impossible et remporté victoire après victoire. Et il n'est pas jusqu'à la moindre de vos paroles et jusqu'au moindre de vos actes qui ne vous ait {mf|élevé|élevée} au-dessus du commun des mortels, comme si un piédestal s'était spontanément matérialisé sous vos pieds. À regarder bon nombre de libres-marchands, on voit tout de suite que cette caste n'est plus ce qu'elle était, mais vous... »

languages.text: «Ese... sello de grandeza que lleva en el rostro. Una y otra vez ha sabido ver más allá de la gente, incluido yo mismo. Discierne sus motivos enseguida. Ha protagonizado hazañas increíbles, ha acumulado una victoria tras otra. Y todo en sus palabras y actos le encumbran por encima de la gente corriente, como si un pedestal se alzase espontáneamente bajo sus pies. Basta con observar a muchos Comerciantes Independientes para advertir que ya no son lo que eran; y sin embargo, usted...».
languages.original_text: "That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

traits.locale_text: «Ese... sello de grandeza que lleva en el rostro. Una y otra vez ha sabido ver más allá de la gente, incluido yo mismo. Discierne sus motivos enseguida. Ha protagonizado hazañas increíbles, ha acumulado una victoria tras otra. Y todo en sus palabras y actos le encumbran por encima de la gente corriente, como si un pedestal se alzase espontáneamente bajo sus pies. Basta con observar a muchos Comerciantes Independientes para advertir que ya no son lo que eran; y sin embargo, usted...».

languages.text: “是你……那伟大的仪态。你一次又一次看透了人们的本质，就连我都不例外。你看穿了人们的动机，你完成了无数不可思议的壮举，赢得了一场又一场胜利。你的一言一行都使你高高在上，仿佛你脚下的地面自动升了起来，变成了一座神坛。除了你之外，还有许多别的行商浪人。看到他们的样子，你就会明白，如今的行商浪人完全无法和他们的祖先相提并论，可你却是个例外……”
languages.original_text: "That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."

traits.locale_text: “是你……那伟大的仪态。你一次又一次看透了人们的本质，就连我都不例外。你看穿了人们的动机，你完成了无数不可思议的壮举，赢得了一场又一场胜利。你的一言一行都使你高高在上，仿佛你脚下的地面自动升了起来，变成了一座神坛。除了你之外，还有许多别的行商浪人。看到他们的样子，你就会明白，如今的行商浪人完全无法和他们的祖先相提并论，可你却是个例外……”

languages.text: "Yüzündeki o haşmet... İnsanların özünü sezişin, niyetlerini okuman, ardı ardına mucizevi başarılara imza atman. Sözlerinle, eylemlerinle âdeta bir kaide kurdun, sıradan insanlardan üstün olduğunu gösterdin. Hür Tacirler artık eskisi gibi değil fakat..."
languages.original_text: "That... stamp of grandeur on your face. Time after time, you saw right through people — even me. You read their motives. You accomplished incredible feats, won victory after victory. And everything in your words and deeds raised you up above ordinary people, as if the pedestal sprung up spontaneously beneath your feet. To look at many Rogue Traders, you can tell the breed is not what it once was, but you..."
